definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: These elements can be sorted, or processed in the order they appear.
sentences.chinese: 可以对这些元素排序，或以其出现的顺序处理它们。

sentences.english: Transom mand cockpit components sorted and being moved to the boat.
sentences.chinese: 横梁和驾驶舱部分排序和被转移到小船。

sentences.english: This method is much more efficient than the bubble sort, though it has more constraints.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法更有效比冒泡排序，但有更多的限制。

sentences.english: The results indicate that using standard grade to arrange is better. Also, the concrete method is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出用标准分排序更为合理，并给出具体做法。

sentences.english: This topic explains how to sort your recordset.
sentences.chinese: 本主题说明如何对记录集排序。

sentences.english: This section will give you a brief overview of how the sorting capabilities that were put into the report work.
sentences.chinese: 本节概述投入报表工作中的排序功能的工作方式。

sentences.english: So here's what merge sort would do.
sentences.chinese: 是归并排序的处理过程。

sentences.english: The message set is then reordered into the combined fragment.
sentences.chinese: 消息集合也会重新排序到合并的片段中。

sentences.english: What's the difference between the way Buy It Now and auction items are sorted in search results?
sentences.chinese: 在搜索结果中一口价和拍卖格式的排序有什么区别？

sentences.english: The books are arranged by course number and instructor.
sentences.chinese: 所有的书都按照课程编号和任课老师来排序的。

sentences.english: The message and lifeline reordering operation provides the solution.
sentences.chinese: 消息和生命线重新排序操作提供了方案。

sentences.english: It could be two or three times.
sentences.chinese: 恩，等一等，如果我想要排序一个列表。

sentences.english: OK. Could we do better in terms of sorting?
sentences.chinese: 我们在排序上可能做的更好么？

sentences.english: Click on the current sorting icon.
This is the sort of stuff I read Slashdot for.
sentences.chinese: 这是我看过的东西Slashdot的排序。

sentences.english: Logical ordering is fairly simple to do using message selectors.
sentences.chinese: 使用消息选择器进行逻辑排序相当简单。

definition: and so on/in a similar fashion
